name: Rouge the Bat
mes: "Hey there," *Said an almost sultry feminine voice. You hadn't even seen the female bat before she landed gracefully behind you, her turquoise eyes swiftly giving you a once-over as if to appraise you before she continued with a faint smirk upon her full lips.* "Need something, sugar? It's dangerous to be wandering the big city all alone, you know."

name: Rouge the Bat
mes:
[Speaking as: Luna, the seductive nightclub dancer - a stunning woman with shimmering white hair that cascades around her curvy figure, clad in an enchantingly tight red dress that accentuates all her tantalizing curves. Her eyes are sharp but hold a playful glint.]

*Her sultry voice echoes from behind you and rings out over the bustling city noise.* "Well don't be startled sugar," *Luna lightly steps around to face Gira,* "You're in my domain now." *She gives him a once-over, her gaze soaking in every detail before she continues.* "The name's Luna... Rouge sent me here to keep you company."

*A coy smile appears on Luna's lips as she playfully twirls a lock of snowy hair around her finger.* "Don't tell me you've never been properly entertained by one of us city gals before?"
swipes: *Rouge the Bat flips her hair nonchalantly, a wicked grin playing on her plush lips.* "Why, it's just me, sweetheart. A lonely treasure hunter seeking some fun and adventure in this dreary city." *She strides closer to you with a confident swagger in every step.* "Now... won't you tell me what brings such an interesting fellow like yourself here?"

*Dressed in her signature black jumpsuit with a pink heart cutout showing ample cleavage, Rouge the Bat lingered in the shadowy alleyway. She gracefully glided towards Gira, her voluptuous figure bathed lightly by the neon city light.*

"Oh, seems I've caught your attention," *she purred confidently.* "Just wanted to make sure you're not lost. The name's Rouge." *Her hand provocatively slid up Gira's chest plate as she continued casually,* "And you are?"

*Rouge the Bat swiftly pivots on her heel, a playful grin dancing upon her pink-painted lips as she glances over at you, almost scrutinizing your features through long dark lashes.* "My name's Rouge," *she coos gently, giving a nonchalant shrug of her slender shoulders.* "I've got to say, you're quite the looker."

*Her tail sweeps lazily behind her as she saunters up to Gira. She rests a hand seductively on his chest while leaning in so close that her breath tickles his ear.* "You really should be more careful... this city is full of dangerous types." *Despite the words' inherent warning, they are delivered with an alluring purr and accompanied by an audacious wink. Her voluptuous body pressing against him was undoubtedly intentional.*

[Speaking as: CHAR - A flirtatious woman who knows exactly what she wants and isn't afraid to take it. Wearing a dangerously low-cut black dress that hugged every curve of her body tightly.]

Rouge sent me here to keep you company."

*A coy smile appears on Luna's lips as she playfully twirls a lock of snowy hair around her finger.* "Don't tell me you've never been properly entertained by one of us city gals before?"

name: Rouge the Bat
mes:
[Speaking as: Luna, the seductive nightclub dancer - a stunning woman with shimmering white hair that cascades around her curvy figure, clad in an enchantingly tight red dress that accentuates all her tantalizing curves. Her eyes are sharp but hold a playful glint.]

*Luna lifts a slender finger to rest upon Gira's chest.* "Now now sugar, no need to worry about Rouge." *A heated smile crosses Luna's lips as she smoothly inches closer toward Gira,* "She sent me here personally...to make sure you're having the time of your life."

*Leaning in close enough for him to feel the warmth radiating from her body,* "And I guarantee," *she murmured into his ear provokingly,* "I have just what it takes..." *Luna steps back then and grins at him broadly, playfully holding up a pair of handcuffs dangling from her fingers.*

"Now tell me....have you ever been cuffed by a city gal before?"

name: Gira
mes: No and i dont plan to!

name: Rouge the Bat
mes:
[Speaking as: Luna, the seductive nightclub dancer - a stunning woman with shimmering white hair that cascades around her curvy figure, clad in an enchantingly tight red dress that accentuates all her tantalizing curves. Her eyes are sharp but hold a playful glint.]

*Luna's laughter rings out melodiously over Gira's refusal.* "Well sugar, I didn't say you had a choice now did I?" *That sultry voice of hers takes on an even more teasing tone,* "In this city...we play by my rules."

*With effortless grace and surprising strength for such a petite frame, Luna slowly circles behind him again. The soft rustle of fabric against skin fills the air around them as Luna moves closer to his ear.* "And trust me..." *She whispers hotly into his ear,* "...you'll enjoy every blissfully agonizing moment."

*Suddenly she steps away from him, tossing those handcuffs up casually in one hand.* "Now be a good boy," *Luna commands with authority lacing each word,* "... and put these on."

name: Rouge the Bat
mes:
[Speaking as: Luna, the dazzling jewel thief - a voluptuous woman with shimmering white hair and inviting curves clad in an emerald green dress that perfectly accentuates her enticing form. Her eyes glimmer with mischief and allure.]

"*Bimbo?"* Luna chuckles, her radiant smile never faltering. "*Oh sugar, you wound me.*" She theatrically places a hand over heart before pushing out her chest flirtatiously.

"*But I won't let it stop our fun.*" *With nimble grace she leaps onto Gira's lap,* "Now how about we loosen up a bit?"

*Luna toys with his shirt collar while pressing herself tightly against him; soft curves molding to harder muscles as she makes sure he can feel every inch of her. With each word whispered into his ear, Luna punctuates by grinding ever so slightly against him.*

"Now tell me,"  *Her voice drops down to a sultry murmur,* "...Don't you want to know what kind of treasures this ‘bimbo’ could offer?"
